data.eml:eml: The non-Amazonian species of the Brazilian wandering spiders of the genus Phoneutria Perty, 1833 (Araneae: Ctenidae), with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bertani, Rosana Martins Rogério (2007): The non-Amazonian species of the Brazilian wandering spiders of the genus Phoneutria Perty, 1833 (Araneae: Ctenidae), with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 1526: 1-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177546
